    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” el_class=”secondary_bg_color convert_to_table services_icons” css=”.vc_custom_1449204239642{margin-bottom: 0px offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][stm_icon icon_size=”67″ icon_height=”90″ title_font_size=”24″ title_font_weight=”700″ align=”center” icon=”stm-security” title=”Safe & Secure” text=”You benefit from title_font_weight=”700″ align=”center” icon=”stm-fast-delivery” title=”Fast Delivery” text=”You benefit from every innovation, whether it involves a simple extension to our Air and Ocean Freight offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][stm_icon icon_size=”67″ icon_height=”90″ title_font_size=”24″ title_font_weight=”700″ align=”center” icon=”stm-support” title=”24/7 Support” text=”All of which explains why you’ll find the team of outstanding support at TransCargo ready to apply their passion for solutions in support of your business.” icon_color=”#ffffff” title_color=”#ffffff” text_color=”#ffffff”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
